original_text: Then I heard him call out in a loud voice, “Bring near those who are appointed to execute judgment on the city, each with a weapon in his hand.”
korean_text: 또 그가 큰 소리로 내 귀에 외쳐 이르시되 이 성읍을 관할하는 자들이 각기 죽이는 무기를 손에 들고 나아오게 하라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Then I heard him call out
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 그가 외치는 것을 들었다

sentences.original_text: Bring near those who are appointed
to execute judgment on the city
each with a weapon in his hand
